entities.name: mr dursley
entities.description: Mr Dursley is described as a big, beefy man with hardly any neck, although he does have a very large moustache. He is the director of Grunnings, which makes drills.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: Mrs Dursley is described as thin and blonde with nearly twice the usual amount of neck, which comes in very useful as she spends so much of her time craning over garden fences, spying on the neighbours.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: Dudley is described by his parents as no finer boy anywhere.

entities.name: grunnings
entities.description: Grunnings is a firm that makes drills and Mr Dursley is its director.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is the location of the Dursleys' home at number four.

relationships.description: Mr Dursley is described as the director of Grunnings, which makes drills.
The Dursleys live at number four Privet Drive.
